38.ときどき世界のどこかに 不思議な「幻想画」が出現します。\n「幻想画」を調べると:
Mystery "Fantasy Art" can appear in various places.
If you examine them, you may be led to a strange space
and see someone unexpected.

146.ときどき世界のどこかに 不思議な「幻想画」が出現します。\n「幻想画」を調べると:
Mystery "Fantasy Art" can appear in various places.
If you examine them, you may be led to a strange space
with powerful monsters.

245.ときどき世界のどこかに 不思議な「幻想画」が出現します。\n「幻想画」を調べると:
Mystery "Fantasy Art" can appear in various places.
If you examine them, you may be led to a strange space
where you can obtain items.

353.アストルティアのどこかで 出会うことがあります。\nもし見つけたら 悩み事を 解:
You may run into them while traveling around Astoltia.
If you do, why not help them with their request?
You may be handsomely rewarded for your trouble...

454.アストルティアのどこかで 出会うことがあります。\n彼のお店には 珍しいアイテム:
You might meet him somewhere in Astoltia.
His store is full of rare items, but you can
only purchase one per day, so be sure to visit
whenever you can.

626.ボスカード ちいさなメダル 錬金素材 など: Boss Cards, Mini Medals, Alchemy Materials, etc.

734.正義のそろばん １０周年ふくびき券の束 緑の上錬金石１０こ券 など: Astrea's Abacus, 10th Anni. Lotto Bundles, 10 Emerald Gems Ticket, etc.

784.アストルティアのどこかで 出会うことがあります。\nとても巨大な このモンスター:
You might encounter these somewhere in Astoltia.
If you encounter one, don't be afraid to talk to it.
You might get items sellable for Gold...

914.１０周年記念ふくびき券 黄金の花びら きんかい など: 10th Anni. Lotto Tickets, Golden Petals, Gold Bars, etc.
